content:
* The interviewee enjoys Netflix because of the wide variety of content available.
* They primarily watch series on Netflix and currently enjoy "Black List."
* They don't use any specific features or recommendations to discover new content.
* They would appreciate more diversity in Netflix's content offerings, but are generally satisfied.
* They have no particular thoughts on Netflix's original programming.
* They are unsure of the pricing of Netflix, but believe it offers good value for money.
* The interviewee suggests that Netflix should keep all seasons of old shows available for viewing.
* They have experienced occasional access issues with Netflix.
* The interviewee has no opinion on whether Netflix has had a positive impact on the way they consume entertainment.
